description: Retrieve inbox placement and engagement rates for the domains that you use to send email.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain that you want to obtain deliverability metrics for.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The first day (in Unix time) that you want to obtain domain deliverability metrics for.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The last day (in Unix time) that you want to obtain domain deliverability metrics for. The EndDate that you specify has to be less than or equal to 30 days after the StartDate.

nested_items.name: OverallVolume
nested_items.description: An object that contains deliverability metrics for the domain that you specified. The data in this object is a summary of all of the data that was collected from the StartDate to the EndDate.

nested_items.name: VolumeStatistics
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about the numbers of messages that arrived in recipients' inboxes and junk mail folders.

nested_items.name: InboxRawCount
nested_items.description: The total number of emails that arrived in recipients' inboxes.

nested_items.name: SpamRawCount
nested_items.description: The total number of emails that arrived in recipients' spam or junk mail folders.

nested_items.name: ProjectedInbox
nested_items.description: An estimate of the percentage of emails sent from the current domain that will arrive in recipients' inboxes.

nested_items.name: ProjectedSpam
nested_items.description: An estimate of the percentage of emails sent from the current domain that will arrive in recipients' spam or junk mail folders.

nested_items.name: ReadRatePercent
nested_items.description: The percentage of emails that were sent from the domain that were read by their recipients.

nested_items.name: DomainIspPlacements
nested_items.description: An object that contains inbox and junk mail placement metrics for individual email providers.

nested_items.name: IspName
nested_items.description: The name of the email provider that the inbox placement data applies to.

nested_items.name: InboxRawCount
nested_items.description: The total number of messages that were sent from the selected domain to the specified email provider that arrived in recipients' inboxes.

nested_items.name: SpamRawCount
nested_items.description: The total number of messages that were sent from the selected domain to the specified email provider that arrived in recipients' spam or junk mail folders.

nested_items.name: InboxPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of messages that were sent from the selected domain to the specified email provider that arrived in recipients' inboxes.

nested_items.name: SpamPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of messages that were sent from the selected domain to the specified email provider that arrived in recipients' spam or junk mail folders.

nested_items.name: DailyVolumes
nested_items.description: An object that contains deliverability metrics for the domain that you specified. This object contains data for each day, starting on the StartDate and ending on the EndDate.

nested_items.name: StartDate
nested_items.description: The date that the DailyVolume metrics apply to, in Unix time.

nested_items.name: VolumeStatistics
nested_items.description: An object that contains inbox placement metrics for a specific day in the analysis period.

nested_items.name: InboxRawCount
nested_items.description: The total number of emails that arrived in recipients' inboxes.

nested_items.name: SpamRawCount
nested_items.description: The total number of emails that arrived in recipients' spam or junk mail folders.

nested_items.name: ProjectedInbox
nested_items.description: An estimate of the percentage of emails sent from the current domain that will arrive in recipients' inboxes.

nested_items.name: ProjectedSpam
nested_items.description: An estimate of the percentage of emails sent from the current domain that will arrive in recipients' spam or junk mail folders.

nested_items.name: DomainIspPlacements
nested_items.description: An object that contains inbox placement metrics for a specified day in the analysis period, broken out by the recipient's email provider.

nested_items.name: IspName
nested_items.description: The name of the email provider that the inbox placement data applies to.

nested_items.name: InboxRawCount
nested_items.description: The total number of messages that were sent from the selected domain to the specified email provider that arrived in recipients' inboxes.

nested_items.name: SpamRawCount
nested_items.description: The total number of messages that were sent from the selected domain to the specified email provider that arrived in recipients' spam or junk mail folders.

nested_items.name: InboxPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of messages that were sent from the selected domain to the specified email provider that arrived in recipients' inboxes.

nested_items.name: SpamPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of messages that were sent from the selected domain to the specified email provider that arrived in recipients' spam or junk mail folders.
